author: jonl
msg: Restructured class hierarchy for converters a little so that all integral converters such as IntegerConverter extend AbstractIntegerConverter.   Then made getNumberFormat() in AbstractNumberConverter abstract and implemented it in AbstractIntegerConverter by creating an integer NumberFormat instance and then turning grouping off and integer-only on.  I like this fix because it really respects i18n, which is sometimes very complex stuff.

author: ehillenius
msg: set locale for new converters as that will not be done anywhere else

author: jonl
msg: Changed HtmlPage to WebPage, HtmlContainer to WebContainer and HtmlComponent to WebComponent for friendliness and consistency with http protocol package.
